page.title: 14Michael's Busy Day 1
page.content: I woke up at 8.30 on Saturday morning and thought "Great! No school." My mum shouted "Get up now, I want to do the beds." so very slowly I did. I heard the car starting as my dad went to work. I went downstairs, had my breakfast, then went to see what was on TV.I watched The Saturday Picture Show until 10.30 then got my bike from the garage while mum held the dog to stop him escaping. At the rec. I met some friends and we did some jumps on our bikes.Then we played tick on the slide. I went home and after lunch dad said "Are you coming for a walk?" We saw a nest in the reeds with six eggs. All of a sudden, we heard the clapping of wings. It was a moorhen and we saw it land and go on its' nest. When we got home it was 1 o'clock. I altered the handlebars on my bike and then it was lunchtime.
